title: The Favorites - NFL Week 8 Gambling Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 8 Gambling Preview
description:
Teams favored by a touchdown or more this NFL season are a perfect 26-0, meaning square bettors of moneyline parlays and survivor pool participants are riding high heading into Week 8. So this week, the Action Network's Chad Millman and Simon Hunter navigate a trap-filled NFL slate filled with plenty of opportunities to profit against public perception. Together they go through ever game on the board and select some of their early leans, including an AFC South matchup that has Simon drooling in anticipation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
